text: Mikhail Anatolyevich Smirnov (; born 10 August 1967, in Minsk) is a former Belarusian football player. ==Honours== Dinamo Minsk *Belarusian Premier League champion: 1992–93, 1993–94 *Belarusian Cup winner: 1993–94 ==External links== * Category:1967 births Category:Sportspeople from Minsk Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Navbahor Namangan players Category:FC Dnepr Mogilev players Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Zawisza Bydgoszcz players Category:Belarusian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:FC Dinamo Minsk players Category:FC Torpedo Moscow players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Stuttgarter Kickers players Category:SV Eintracht Trier 05 players Category:SG Sonnenhof Großaspach players Category:SpVgg Ludwigsburg players Category:FC SKVICH Minsk players Category:Association football midfielders Category:FK Pirmasens players
title: Mikhail Smirnov (footballer, born 1967)
